Our old processes for keeping the public JUnit javadoc out of date didn't
s=
urvive our latest upheaval in hosting--my apologies.  Since everything is
h=
osted at github now, it should be possible for anyone with an hour or two
t=
o post a pull request to gh-pages that would update the current javadoc to
=
4.11.  It may be a number of days until that person is me, sadly.  Thanks,
=

    David
